meanings.definition: A woman who invents or creates something new.
meanings.sent1: The inventresses in the story created a magical potion.
meanings.sent2: The inventresses at the science fair showcased their innovative projects.
meanings.sent3: The inventresses decided to invent a machine that could make cookies instantly.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a workshop where inventresses crafted new ideas every day.
meanings.sent5: The town celebrated the inventresses who brought new technologies to life.

meanings.sent1: The inventresses gathered to discuss their latest inventions.
meanings.sent2: Inventresses from around the world attended the innovation conference.
meanings.sent3: The inventresses' inventions were so popular that everyone wanted to buy them.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the chatter of inventresses sharing their ideas.
meanings.sent5: The inventresses' creativity knew no bounds as they continued to amaze the world.
